com.mainmethod.trailmix1

Class FragmentNavigationDrawer

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.ViewGroup
      • android.support.v4.widget.DrawerLayout
        • com.mainmethod.trailmix1.FragmentNavigationDrawer

  • public class FragmentNavigationDrawer
extends android.support.v4.widget.DrawerLayout

    TrailMix for Android Capstone Project

    This is a custom class for the Left Navigation Menu which extends DrawerLayout

    Client: Erica Duque

    Oganization: Region of Peel

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    jonathan zarate, parth sondarva, shivam sharma, garrett may

        public void addNavItem(java.lang.String navTitle,
                       int icon,
                       java.lang.String windowTitle,
                       java.lang.Class<? extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment> fragmentClass)

        Adding Navigation Items and Create Fragments/"Views" from each item

        Parameters:
        navTitle - - Defines the name values for each nav item
        icon - - Sets the icon associated with each nav item
        windowTitle - - Defines the window title for each fragment activity
        fragmentClass - - Creates a new fragment for each nav item on click
